channel.title: Help with a few things
channel.description:
i need a help with a few things..
1. unlimited run for my server?
2. fixing this error in my run.bat [code]java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17365) at client.process(client.java:17351) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) at server.main(server.java:51) Tru3Isle[fatal] - exception[/code]

item.title: Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Lol I thought that also lol go into player.java find this

playerEnergy -= 1;

Remove it
There unlimited running

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Oh damn, I misread the first question, I thought you meant actually running your server, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

#1 - Either get a nice computer, or buy a dedicated server.

#2 - Can’t tell, because you must tell us what’s the last thing you edited/added before you runned your server.

Read full topic
